about_the_game:
Step into the role of Valkyrie Lilyth and embark on an epic quest to maintain the balance across the Nine Realms. As a goddess, journey to Midgard to recruit warrior souls to aid Asgard in the face of the impending great disaster: the era of Ragnarok.

Explore diverse villages and treacherous, enigmatic dungeons. Engage in battles against formidable monsters with the aid of the Einherjar. Uncover rare treasures and assist mortals in perilous situations.

Key Features

-Classic dungeon-crawling RPG experience.

-Strategic party management and battle tactics.

-A vast array of items and monsters to discover.

Main Characters



Lilyth Valkyrie

A steadfast Valkyrie committed to Asgard and her divine mission, descends to Midgard to recruit warrior souls for the heavenly army.
An unexpected encounter with Aiden sets off a chain of events that will alter the destiny of Lilyth and the nine realms of the universe forever.


Aiden

A war hero with unparalleled military prowess, was betrayed by his own comrades and poisoned, robbed of an honorable death on the battlefield. His spirit, teetering on the edge of becoming a vengeful wraith, was calmed by the enchanting presence of Valkyrie Lilyth.

With beauty beyond mortal comprehension and a voice that could soothe even the most tormented souls, Lilyth captivated Aiden. Enamored and devoted, he vowed to protect her, becoming her steadfast guardian as she navigated her perilous quest, their fates intertwined by love and destiny.

name: Tales of Valkyrie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Play as Lilyth, a Valkyrie on a mission to recruit warriors for Ragnarok. Explore dungeons, battle monsters, and collect treasures in this classic RPG. Forge alliances, manage your party, and shape the fate of the Nine Realms.
